properties.tree_description:
Pecan Tree in the backyardReason for Removal:OtherComments:The tree has been dropping limbs over last several months and these limbs have fallen on the car (only place on the property where a car can be parked) and sometimes close to occupants of the house. The larger limbs pose a hazard to the car but also the people living who use this area frequently. The tree was examined by arborist who noted crown dieback and recommended removal of tree for safety.
